channel.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
channel.description: can you please help.. i keep getting that message when trying to compile/run a client through my compiler.. i have tryed many

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Killer_Coder Killer Coder
item.description:
@Killer_Coder wrote:

ive edited and messd around a bit and have gotten here…

error: Class names, ‘client.jar,compile.bat,JAVA,manifest,MoparScape.jar,MoparSc
ape.lnk,Music,run.bat,runclient.bat,runserver.bat,ServerFile.bat,java’, are only
accepted if annotation processing is explicitly requested
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 08:33:02 AM[/size][hr]exception in thread"main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Tyy_yyT Tyy/yyT
item.description:
@Tyy_yyT wrote:

You don’t have java then. Hmm.

Open run.
Then type in.

command

Then type in the following.

java -version

Read full topic

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Killer_Coder Killer Coder
item.description:
@Killer_Coder wrote:

javac:invalid flag: Counter Strike Source.lnk
usage:javac
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue…

Read full topic
item.source: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Tyy_yyT Tyy/yyT
item.description:
@Tyy_yyT wrote:

Use.

@Echo Off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" * .java @Pause

Try that code.

Read full topic
item.source: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Killer_Coder Killer Coder
item.description:
@Killer_Coder wrote:

Javac: file not found: *.java
usage:javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic
item.source: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Tyy_yyT Tyy/yyT
item.description:
@Tyy_yyT wrote:

You need to download java. If you already have it use this in your compiler.

@Echo Off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java @Pause

Read full topic
